Improvements.Improvement: Split testEntityFilterCrud into several smaller tests
Improvements.Description: The method testEntityFilterCrud is testing multiple things. It is generally better to have each test method test only one thing. This way, if a test fails, you know immediately what the problem is. Split this method into several smaller methods, each testing only one thing.

Improvements.Improvement: Use constants instead of repeating string literals
Improvements.Change_Diff: - String noCreateEntityTag="noCreateEntity"; ...+ private static final String NO_CREATE_ENTITY_TAG = "noCreateEntity"; ...
Improvements.Description: There are several string literals that are repeated multiple times in the method (e.g., 'noCreateEntity'). It would be better to define these as constants at the beginning of the method. This would make the code cleaner and also easier to maintain.
The `apiVersion` method call is not needed, as the `version` is set again later with `info` object in `testOpenApi`.

Method_Improvements.Final code: private static final String NO_CREATE_ENTITY_TAG = "noCreateEntity"; ... @Test void testNoCreateEntity(){...} @Test void testNoReadEntity(){...} ... OpenApiBuilder builder=new OpenApiBuilder(entityDictionary); ...
